resources.string: Recommended Level: {level} Minimum Players: {players}

You must have at least <font color="#ebe3d6">{item}</font>.
You must have at least <font color="#ebe3d6">{item}</font>.
The quality of the overall loot increases as difficulty level increases.\n\nItems you find may vary from the listed items based on their Gear Score.
You will be kicked out of the queue if you leave the group.\nAre you sure?
Your group is already in a queue for a different Expedition. Create a new group to open this Expedition.
Your group is already in a queue for a different Expedition. Create a new group to open this Trial.
Your group is already in a queue for a different Expedition. Create a new group to open this Elite Trial.
Your group is already in a queue for a different Expedition. Create a new group to open this Seasonal Trial.
Your group already has an active Expedition or Trial. All group members need to exit the active Instance to open this Expedition.
Your group already has an active Expedition or Trial. All group members need to exit the active Instance to open this Soul Trial.
Your group already has an active Expedition or Trial. All group members need to exit the active Instance to open this Elite Trial.
Your group already has an active Expedition or Trial. All group members need to exit the active Instance to open this Seasonal Trial.
Cannot enter this instance while in a raid group.
Must be in a raid group.
Form a group and convert it to raid from the group menu.
Ask the group leader to open the trial.
This Soul Trial is currently disabled.
This Elite Trial is currently disabled.
This Seasonal Trial is currently disabled.
You have been removed from the Expedition queue.
You have been removed from the Soul Trial queue.
You have been removed from the Elite Trial queue.
You have been removed from the Seasonal Trial queue.
Your contributions and rewards will be lost if you leave!
Your group will be teleported into the Expedition.
Entering an Expedition will <font color="#ffd45f" face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">abandon all PvP missions</font>. Continue?
Entering Soul Trial will <font color="#ffd45f" face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">abandon all PvP missions</font>. Continue?

Expedition is currently full. Join the queue to enter the Expedition.
Soul Trial is currently full. Join the queue to enter the Soul Trial.
Elite Trial is currently full. Join the queue to enter the Elite Trial.
Seasonal Trial is currently full. Join the queue to enter the Seasonal Trial.
You are already in a queue for Outpost Rush.
You can open this Expedition in {timeRemaining}
You can open this Soul Trial in {timeRemaining}
You can open this Elite Trial in {timeRemaining}
You can open this Seasonal Trial in {timeRemaining}
You may enter up to {amount} Regular Expeditions per day.
You may enter up to {amount} Elite Trials per day.
You may enter up to {amount} Seasonal Trials per day.
You may enter up to {amount} Mutated Expeditions per week.

<font color="#ffd45f" face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">Weekly Mutation</font>
Elemental Mutations, Promotions and Curses are randomized weekly for Mutated Expeditions.

<font color="#ebe3d6" face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">Mutation</font>
Battle through Elemental Mutations

<font color="#ebe3d6" face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">Promotion</font>
Elite Promotions for Enemies

<font color="#ebe3d6" face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">Curses</font>
Expedition wide Effects
<font color="#ff9393" face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">Enemies</font> may have the following <font color="#ebe3d6" face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">Perks:</font>
<font color="#ff9393" face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">Enemies</font> may have the following <font color="#ebe3d6" face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">Buffs:</font>
Multiplies the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">total score</font> by the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">number of requirements</font> met below.
Complete this Expedition with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">{rank} Rank</font> to unlock the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">next difficulty</font>.
Complete this Expedition to unlock the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">next difficulty</font>.
An Expedition is randomly selected every week to mutate. Only the selected Expedition can be played with raised difficulties.
<font color="#ffd45f" face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">Items</font> have a chance to drop with these <font color="#ebe3d6" face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">Perks:</font>
Umbral Shards are rewarded based on your rank when the Expedition is completed.\n\nUnlock the next Expedition difficulty with Silver rank or higher.
This difficulty has not been unlocked yet.
Enemies apply a stacking Disease on hit, reducing healing by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Disease_1.HealMod * -100]}% per stack.
Enemies apply a stacking Disease on hit, reducing healing by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Disease_1.HealMod * -100]}/{[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Disease_2.HealMod * -100]}% per stack.
Enemies cast slicing beams that deal {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_RotatingBeam_Damage.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% base Void damage when touched.

Enemies forgo the {[Type_AbilityData.AI_Elite_StaggerAndStaminaDMG.BlockDamage * -100]}% reduced stamina damage in Expeditions.\nEnemies deal {[Type_AbilityData.Mut_StaminaDamage_1.BlockDamage * 100]}% increased stamina damage.\nAdditionally, upon breaking your block, enemies apply a bleed, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_StaminaDamage_1_BlockBreak_Bleed.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% base health damage per tick.

Enemies forgo the {[Type_AbilityData.AI_Elite_StaggerAndStaminaDMG.BlockDamage * -100]}% reduced stamina damage in Expeditions.\nEnemies deal {[Type_AbilityData.Mut_StaminaDamage_1.BlockDamage * 100]}/{[Type_AbilityData.Mut_StaminaDamage_2.BlockDamage * 100]}% increased stamina damage.\nAdditionally, upon breaking your block, enemies apply a bleed, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_StaminaDamage_1_BlockBreak_Bleed.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}/{[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_StaminaDamage_2_BlockBreak_Bleed.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% base health damage per tick.

When hit, enemies generate Fury. At {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Enrage_Effect.AddOnStackSize]} Fury, they become enraged, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Enrage_Empower.DMGStandard * 100]}% increased damage and become {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Enrage_Empower.DynamicModelScaleFactor * 100]}% larger.
Enemies drain {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_ManaDamage_1.Mana* -1]} mana upon being hit.
Enemies drain {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_ManaDamage_1.Mana* -1]}/{[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_ManaDamage_2.Mana* -1]} mana upon being hit.
Enemies cast a Silence zone on attacking players.
Enemies cast a shield that blocks player projectiles.
Enemies deal {[Type_AffixStatData.AI_FireDMG_50.DamagePercentage * 100]}% of all damage as Fire damage.
Enemies apply Burn on hit, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Fir_Burn_1_Effect.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% base Fire damage over time.

Enemies apply Burn on hit, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Fir_Burn_1_Effect.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}/{[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Fir_Burn_2_Effect.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% base Fire damage over time.
Enemies cast a Burn zone on attacking players, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Fir_AOE_1_Damage.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% base Fire damage over time.
Enemies cast a Burn zone on attacking players, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Fir_AOE_2_Damage.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% base Fire damage over time.
Enemies explode upon death, dealing {[Type_DamageData.Mut_Fir_Death.DmgCoef * 100]}% base Fire damage in a small area.
Enemies deal {[Type_AffixStatData.AI_IceDMG_50.DamagePercentage * 100]}% of all damage as Ice damage.
Heavy and Special enemy attacks cause a slow on hit.
All enemy attacks cause a slow on hit.
Enemies deal increased damage to slow players.
Enemies deal increased damage to slow players.
While in combat, enemies inflict Biting Cold, dealing damage to players who are not near them.
While in combat, enemies inflict Biting Cold, dealing damage to players who are not near them.
Enemies explode upon death, dealing Ice damage and slowing players.
Enemies drop a destructable ice crystal upon death that slows and roots players.
Enemies deal {[Type_AffixStatData.AI_NatureDMG_50.DamagePercentage * 100]}% of all damage as Nature damage.
Enemies deal {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Nat_Thorns_1_Effect.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% base Nature damage upon being hit.

Enemies deal {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Nat_Thorns_1_Effect.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}/{[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Nat_Thorns_2_Effect.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% base Nature damage upon being hit.
Enemies periodically spawn Poison zones, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Nat_Pools_1_Damage.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}% base Nature damage over time.

Enemies periodically spawn Poison zones, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Nat_Pools_1_Damage.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}/{[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Nat_Pools_2_Damage.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}% base Nature damage over time.

Enemies periodically spawn a poison entity that deals {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Nat_Crawler_1_Damage.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% base nature damage over time and locks onto a far target. Upon reaching the target player, casts an area root.

Enemies periodically spawn a poison entity that deals {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Nat_Crawler_1_Damage.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}/{[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Nat_Crawler_2_Damage.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% base nature damage over time and locks onto a far target. Upon reaching the target player, casts an area root.
Enemies leave a zone upon death, healing enemies that stand in it for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Nat_Death_Effect.HealthModifierPercent * 100]}% health per second.
Enemies deal {[Type_AffixStatData.AI_CorruptionDMG_50.DamagePercentage * 100]}% of all damage as Void damage.

Enemies apply Leech on hit, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Voi_Leech_1_Damage.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% base Void damage and healing the enemy for {[Type_AbilityData.Mut_Voi_Leech_1_Heal.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}% damage dealt over time.

Enemies apply Leech on hit, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Voi_Leech_1_Damage.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}/{[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Voi_Leech_2_Damage.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% base Void damage and healing the enemy for {[Type_AbilityData.Mut_Voi_Leech_1_Heal.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}/{[Type_AbilityData.Mut_Voi_Leech_2_Heal.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}% damage dealt over time.

Enemies apply building stacks of Paranoia when hit. At {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Voi_Stacks_1_Effect.AddOnStackSize]} stacks, causes a void burst to appear at your location dealing {[Type_DamageData.Mut_Voi_Stacks_1.DmgCoef * 100]}% base Void damage in a small area.

Enemies apply building stacks of Paranoia when hit. At {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Voi_Stacks_1_Effect.AddOnStackSize]}/{[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Voi_Stacks_2_Effect.AddOnStackSize]} stacks, causes a void burst to appear at your location dealing {[Type_DamageData.Mut_Voi_Stacks_1.DmgCoef * 100]}/{[Type_DamageData.Mut_Voi_Stacks_2.DmgCoef * 100]}% base Void damage in a small area.
On death, enemies cast a spell granting other enemies in the area Void Empower, increasing their Void damage by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Voi_Death_Empower.DMGCorruption * 100]}%.
After dodging, you leave a small zone that deals Fire damage over time. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)
After dodging, you leave a small zone that deals Ice damage over time. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)
After dodging, you leave a small zone that deals Nature damage over time. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)
After dodging, you leave a small zone that deals Void damage over time. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)
Periodically selects a chosen player. That player emits an aura dealing Fire damage to nearby players and gains greatly increased Fire absorption. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)
Periodically selects a chosen player. That player emits an aura dealing Ice damage to nearby players and gains greatly increased Ice absorption. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

Periodically selects a chosen player. That player emits an aura dealing Nature damage to nearby players and gains greatly increased Nature absorption. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)
Periodically selects a chosen player. That player emits an aura dealing Void damage to nearby players and gains greatly increased Void absorption. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

Periodically applies Weary to players in combat, slowing their movement by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse2_Minor_SlowRend.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% and increasing all damage they take by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse2_Minor_SlowRend.WKNStandard * 100]}%. The effect can be delayed by using abilities. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)
Slowed by {[Type_StatusEffect.Mut_Curse2_Minor_SlowRend.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% and suffering {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse2_Minor_SlowRend.WKNStandard * 100]}% increased damage from all sources.

Using abilities applies a stack of Offering, causing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse2_Fir_Major_Damage.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% max health Fire damage over time to the player, stacking {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse2_Fir_Major_Damage.StackMax]} times. All player damage has {[Type_AbilityData.Mut_Curse2_Base_Major_Lifesteal.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}% life steal while affected by Offering. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

Using abilities applies a stack of Offering, causing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse2_Ice_Major_Damage.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% max health Ice damage over time to the player, stacking {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse2_Ice_Major_Damage.StackMax]} times. All player damage has {[Type_AbilityData.Mut_Curse2_Base_Major_Lifesteal.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}% life steal while affected by Offering (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

Using abilities applies a stack of Offering, causing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse2_Nat_Major_Damage.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% max health Nature damage over time to the player, stacking {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse2_Nat_Major_Damage.StackMax]} times. All player damage has {[Type_AbilityData.Mut_Curse2_Base_Major_Lifesteal.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}% life steal while affected by Offering (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

Using abilities applies a stack of Offering, causing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse2_Voi_Major_Damage.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% max health Void damage over time to the player, stacking {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse2_Voi_Major_Damage.StackMax]} times. All player damage has {[Type_AbilityData.Mut_Curse2_Base_Major_Lifesteal.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}% life steal while affected by Offering (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

Periodically selects the player with the lowest percent health. After several seconds, the selected player casts chain Fire, damaging nearby players for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Fir_Curse3_Minor_Damage.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% of their max health. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

Periodically selects the player with the lowest percent health. After several seconds, the selected player casts chain Ice, damaging nearby players for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Ice_Curse3_Minor_Damage.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% of their max health. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

Periodically selects the player with the lowest percent health. After several seconds, the selected player casts chain Nature, damaging nearby players for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Nat_Curse3_Minor_Damage.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% of their max health. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

Periodically selects the player with the lowest percent health. After several seconds, the selected player casts chain Void, damaging nearby players {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Voi_Curse3_Minor_Damage.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% of their max health. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

When selecting the lowest percent health player, all other players are given Shrivelled Weaken, reducing their damage by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse3_Weaken.DMGStandard * -100]}% and damage based healing by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse3_Weaken.HealScalingValueMultiplier * -100]}%. The selected player gains an aura that cleanses Shrivelled Weaken. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

When selecting the lowest percent health player, all other players are given Shrivelled Weaken, reducing their damage by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse3_Weaken.DMGStandard * -100]}% and damage based healing by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse3_Weaken.HealScalingValueMultiplier * -100]}%. The selected player gains an aura that cleanses Shrivelled Weaken. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

When selecting the lowest percent health player, all other players are given Shrivelled Weaken, reducing their damage by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse3_Weaken.DMGStandard * -100]}% and damage based healing by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse3_Weaken.HealScalingValueMultiplier * -100]}%. The selected player gains an aura that cleanses Shrivelled Weaken. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

When selecting the lowest percent health player, all other players are given Shrivelled Weaken, reducing their damage by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse3_Weaken.DMGStandard * -100]}% and damage based healing by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse3_Weaken.HealScalingValueMultiplier * -100]}%. The selected player gains an aura that cleanses Shrivelled Weaken. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

While silence zones are active, all players lose natural mana regeneration. Standing in the silence zone grants {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse4_Major_ManaRegen.Mana]} mana per {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse4_Major_ManaRegen.TickRate]} seconds. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

Using abilities depletes a global affliction. When the affliction is depleted, a zone is cast on all players which silences players in its area. After the affliction expires, the zones detonate dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Fir_Curse4_Minor_Damage.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% max health Fire damage to players in the radius. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

Using abilities depletes a global affliction. When the affliction is depleted, a zone is cast on all players which silences players in its area. After the affliction expires, the zones detonate dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Ice_Curse4_Minor_Damage.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% max health Ice damage to players in the radius. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

Using abilities depletes a global affliction. When the affliction is depleted, a zone is cast on all players which silences players in its area. After the affliction expires, the zones detonate dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Nat_Curse4_Minor_Damage.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% max health Nature damage to players in the radius. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

Using abilities depletes a global affliction. When the affliction is depleted, a zone is cast on all players which silences players in its area. After the affliction expires, the zones detonate dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Voi_Curse4_Minor_Damage.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% max health Void damage to players in the radius. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

Upon dodging, players are inflicted by an Fire damage over time effect dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Fir_Minor_Damage.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% of their max HP worth of damage every second for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Fir_Minor_Damage.BaseDuration]}s. Stacks up to {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Fir_Minor_Damage.StackMax]} times. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

If Unstable expires with {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Fir_Minor_Damage.StackMax]} stacks active, it drops a {[SpellDataTable_Global.Mut_Fir_Curse1_Major.Radius]}m radius zone that lasts for {[SpellDataTable_Global.Mut_Fir_Curse1_Major.Duration / 1000]} seconds. While inside, players take {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Fir_Major_Damage_DoT.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% of their max HP worth of damage every second. Entering the effect consumes all stacks of Unstable, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Fir_Major_Damage_Cleanse.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% of max HP damage. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

Upon dodging, players are inflicted by an Lightning damage over time effect dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Lig_Minor_Damage.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% of their max HP worth of damage every second for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Lig_Minor_Damage.BaseDuration]}s. Stacks up to {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Lig_Minor_Damage.StackMax]} times. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

If Unstable expires with {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Lig_Minor_Damage.StackMax]} stacks active, it drops a {[SpellDataTable_Global.Mut_Lig_Curse1_Major.Radius]}m radius zone that lasts for {[SpellDataTable_Global.Mut_Lig_Curse1_Major.Duration / 1000]} seconds. While inside, players take {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Lig_Major_Damage_DoT.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% of their max HP worth of damage every second. Entering the effect consumes all stacks of Unstable, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Lig_Major_Damage_Cleanse.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% of max HP damage. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

Upon dodging, players are inflicted by an Void damage over time effect dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Voi_Minor_Damage.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% of their max HP worth of damage every second for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Voi_Minor_Damage.BaseDuration]}s. Stacks up to {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Voi_Minor_Damage.StackMax]} times. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

If Unstable expires with {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Voi_Minor_Damage.StackMax]} stacks active, it drops a {[SpellDataTable_Global.Mut_Voi_Curse1_Major.Radius]}m radius zone that lasts for {[SpellDataTable_Global.Mut_Voi_Curse1_Major.Duration / 1000]} seconds. While inside, players take {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Voi_Major_Damage_DoT.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% of their max HP worth of damage every second. Entering the effect consumes all stacks of Unstable, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Voi_Major_Damage_Cleanse.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% of max HP damage. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

Upon dodging, players are inflicted by an Nature damage over time effect dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Nat_Minor_Damage.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% of their max HP worth of damage every second for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Nat_Minor_Damage.BaseDuration]}s. Stacks up to {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Nat_Minor_Damage.StackMax]} times. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

If Unstable expires with {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Nat_Minor_Damage.StackMax]} stacks active, it drops a {[SpellDataTable_Global.Mut_Nat_Curse1_Major.Radius]}m radius zone that lasts for {[SpellDataTable_Global.Mut_Nat_Curse1_Major.Duration / 1000]} seconds. While inside, players take {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Nat_Major_Damage_DoT.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% of their max HP worth of damage every second. Entering the effect consumes all stacks of Unstable, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Nat_Major_Damage_Cleanse.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% of max HP damage. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

Upon dodging, players are inflicted by an Ice damage over time effect dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Ice_Minor_Damage.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% of their max HP worth of damage every second for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Ice_Minor_Damage.BaseDuration]}s. Stacks up to {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Ice_Minor_Damage.StackMax]} times. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)

If Unstable expires with {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Ice_Minor_Damage.StackMax]} stacks active, it drops a {[SpellDataTable_Global.Mut_Ice_Curse1_Major.Radius]}m radius zone that lasts for {[SpellDataTable_Global.Mut_Ice_Curse1_Major.Duration / 1000]} seconds. While inside, players take {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Ice_Major_Damage_DoT.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% of their max HP worth of damage every second. Entering the effect consumes all stacks of Unstable, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Mut_Curse1_Ice_Major_Damage_Cleanse.HealthModifierPercent * -100]}% of max HP damage. (This effect cannot be cleansed by player abilities)
The highest rank you achieved on this difficulty: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">{rank}</font>
A one time reward. Mutated Expedition Tuning Orbs are also available through the Faction Shop.

<font color="#ebe3d6" face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">Recommended Gear Score</font>

Combat calculations are affected by the difference between your average Gear Score and the Recommended Gear Score.

<font color="#ff9393">Lower</font> than the Recommended Minimum Gear Score results in <font color="#ebe3d6">doing less damage</font>, and <font color="#ebe3d6">taking more damage</font> from enemies in the Expedition.

<font color="#ebe3d6" face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">Recommended Gear Score</font>

Combat calculations are affected by the difference between your average Gear Score and the Recommended Gear Score.

<font color="#ff9393">Lower</font> than the Recommended Minimum Gear Score results in <font color="#ebe3d6">doing less damage</font>, and <font color="#ebe3d6">taking more damage</font> from enemies in the Elite Trial.

<font color="#ebe3d6" face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">Recommended Gear Score</font>

Combat calculations are affected by the difference between your average Gear Score and the Recommended Gear Score.

<font color="#ff9393">Lower</font> than the Recommended Minimum Gear Score results in <font color="#ebe3d6">doing less damage</font>, and <font color="#ebe3d6">taking more damage</font> from enemies in the Seasonal Trial.
<font color={color} face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">WARNING:</font> Your Average Gear Score is too low to perform well in this Expedition.

Invite a player to a group
Click more options under group management
Raid is formed through an existing group. Invite at least one player to form a group.
Access "more options" under group members' portraits.
A player who converts the group into a raid will be assigned as the group leader. They will be able to manage the raid and invite players into the raid.
Successfully completing the trial will always drop the following if you haven't reached your daily/weekly limit.
Weekly Chest contains one of these items.
These items are awarded upon Trial completion. Repeatable.
These only drop on first 7 completions and change every week.
These only drop on first 7 completions and change every week.

string.comment: Says Enter since the button is already in a disabled state

resources.string: Your first {maxCount} attempts at the Trial each week earn bonus rewards. Season Exclusives only drop during these attempts.
